title: Sɛ Mekan Tete Abasɛm Dɛdɛ No

lines: Sɛ mekan tete abasɛm dɛdɛ no,
B're a Yesu traa nnipa mu,
Mepɛ sɛ na 'nka meka ho bi.
Mepɛ sɛ 'nka ɔde Ne nsa too me so,
Ná ɔde Ne basa twaa me ho,
Na 'nka mahu N'animtew a ɔde kaa sɛ:
'Momma mmofraa no kwan mmra Me nkyɛn'
M'ani agyina saa anuonyam b're no,
B're pa a ɛyɛ dɛ kyɛn so,
B'rč a mmofraa dɔfo a wofi tebea nyinaam',
Begu Ne so agye nhyira no.
